channel.title: The Pipetogrep Blog - Posts tagged with: General

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello and welcome to blog.pipetogrep.org. I started this to write about my misadventures in retrocomputing but I'm sure I'll have plenty of other stuff in here too. This post is here to prove to myself that I can manage a blog via BSSG. I love the idea of simplistic tools to do complicated tasks and abuses of Bash shell scripting and BSSG scratches both of those itches for me. Thank you for visiting and hopefully you'll find something of value or entertainment here.
item.dc:creator: Chris Jones (blog@pipetogrep.org)
